medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed mild abdominal pain and fever the day after discharge last week. After treatment with ciprofloxacin, the fever and pain subsided. He experienced epigastric abdominal pain in the morning of admission, which gradually increased and then radiated to the right side of his chest.
medical_history.past_medical_history: NSTEMI s/p DES to RCA; Choledocholithiasis - s/p biliary stent
medical_history.family_history: Father with MI at age unspecified; three brothers with CABG and MIs.
